reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater fits well, particularly noting it's good for tall women, and appreciate its comfort, describing it as cozy and not scratchy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Knit sweater
items.body: Very comfortable. It is oversized, so the fit is great. The style is great. This is the second one I have purchased. The sweater can be worn with jeans or dress pants, so very vesatile. Read more
items.author: Veleta

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great winter sweater
items.body: Love this sweater! It's soft, cozy and roomy. Great price as well. Definitely will come back to buy more colors. You won't be disappointed. Sizing is perfect. I got an XL and it is a loose fitting XL. Even put it in the dryer and it did not shrink. Read more
items.author: Bruinsgirl_77

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: I really like this sweater. The Color is amazing. It is comfortable and slightly oversized. It is thick but not soft material. It is a rougher material but not scratchy. The only downfall is, it stretches out easily and the waist part is stretched out and doesn't sit nicely like it did when I bought it and wore it for the first time. Washing it stretches out the band and it doesn't go back to its original shape. Read more
items.author: MaegMC

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Sweater
items.body: I LOVE this sweater, its perfect, soft, not too heavy, lays nicely and the color green is a perfect shade. its not form fitting at all. I am 200 pounds, 5'7, and I have a large size and have no problem.s Read more
items.author: Laura

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite sweater
items.body: My favorite sweater I own now! The colors are perfect and itâ€™s a great medium heavy sweater! I wear a medium and it fits perfect for a slouchy but put together outfit. If you want it baggier size up for sure. Read more
items.author: Amanda Crawford

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great chunky sweater
items.body: Super cute thicker sweater. Size up if you want it to be more oversized. Very warm. Great purchase for the price. Fabric feels nice and soft, not scratchy. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Color isnâ€™t accurate
items.body: The caramel is not caramel, itâ€™s rust orange. Other than that, it seems like a great sweater. Oversized, comfy, soft. I have to send it back though because of the color. Read more
items.author: Crystal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit
items.body: Love this sweater !!ðŸ‘ðŸ». Thin so you donâ€™t get super hot. Looks great with leggings and boots. Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Brown, Blue, Rose, Army Green, Black, Colorblock 284, Navy Blue, Colorblock 278, Tw638, Red, Tz250, Colorblock 458, Lake Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
